Level_1_Greetings_1.text: Hello world, this is a test.

Level_1_DailyLife_2.text: I usually wake up at seven in the morning.
Level_1_DailyLife_2.phonetics: /aɪ ˈjuːʒuəli weɪk ʌp æt ˈsɛvən ɪn ðə ˈmɔːrnɪŋ/

Level_1_Time_3.text: What time does the movie start?

Level_1_Ordering_4.text: I'd like a glass of water, please.
Level_1_Ordering_4.phonetics: /aɪd laɪk ə glæs ʌv ˈwɔtər pliz/

Level_1_SelfIntro_6.text: My name is John, and I am from New York.
Level_1_SelfIntro_6.phonetics: /maɪ neɪm ɪz dʒɑn ænd aɪ æm frʌm nu jɔrk/

Level_1_Request_9.text: Can you help me with this box?
Level_1_Request_9.phonetics: /kæn ju hɛlp mi wɪð ðɪs bɑks/

Level_1_Apology_10.text: I am so sorry for the delay.
Level_1_Apology_10.phonetics: /aɪ æm soʊ ˈsɑri fɔr ðə dɪˈleɪ/

Level_2_WeatherTalk_11.text: The weather is beautiful today, but it might rain later.
Level_2_WeatherTalk_11.phonetics: /ðə ˈwɛðər ɪz ˈbjutəfəl təˈdeɪ bət ɪt maɪt reɪn ˈleɪtər/

Level_2_Travel_12.text: The airport is about thirty minutes away from here by express train.
Level_2_Travel_12.phonetics: /ðə ˈɛrpɔːrt ɪz əˈbaʊt ˈθɜːrti ˈmɪnɪts əˈweɪ frʌm hɪr baɪ ɪkˈsprɛs treɪn/

Level_2_Directions_13.text: Can you tell me how to get to the nearest subway station?
Level_2_Directions_13.phonetics: /kæn ju tɛl mi haʊ tu gɛt tu ðə ˈnɪrɪst ˈsʌbˌweɪ ˈsteɪʃən/

Level_2_Shopping_14.text: I am just browsing, thank you.

Level_2_Medical_15.text: I have a severe headache and I feel dizzy.
Level_2_Medical_15.phonetics: /aɪ hæv ə sɪˈvɪr ˈhɛdeɪk ænd aɪ fil ˈdɪzi/

Level_2_SocialMedia_16.text: Don't forget to like, share, and subscribe to my channel.
Level_2_SocialMedia_16.phonetics: /doʊnt fərˈgɛt tu laɪk ʃɛr ænd səbˈskraɪb tu maɪ ˈtʃænəl/

Level_2_Hobby_17.text: I enjoy reading historical novels in my free time.
Level_2_Hobby_17.phonetics: /aɪ ɪnˈdʒɔɪ ˈridɪŋ hɪˈstɔrɪkəl ˈnɑvəlz ɪn maɪ fri taɪm/

Level_2_Work_18.text: I will send you the required documents by the end of the day.
Level_2_Work_18.phonetics: /aɪ wɪl sɛnd ju ðə rɪˈkwaɪrd ˈdɑkjumənts baɪ ði ɛnd ʌv ðə deɪ/

Level_2_Suggestion_19.text: Perhaps we should reschedule the meeting to next week.
Level_2_Suggestion_19.phonetics: /pərˈhæps wi ʃʊd riˈskɛdʒul ðə ˈmitɪŋ tu nɛkst wik/

Level_2_Opinion_20.text: In my opinion, the new policy is quite effective.
Level_2_Opinion_20.phonetics: /ɪn maɪ əˈpɪnjən ðə nu ˈpɑləsi ɪz kwaɪt ɪˈfɛktɪv/

Level_2_Restaurant_21.text: Could we get the menu again, please?
Level_2_Restaurant_21.phonetics: /kʊd wi gɛt ðə ˈmɛnju əˈgɛn pliz/

Level_2_Future_22.text: I am planning to move to Canada next year.
Level_2_Future_22.phonetics: /aɪ æm ˈplænɪŋ tu muv tu ˈkænədə nɛkst jɪr/

Level_2_Problem_23.text: There seems to be a slight misunderstanding about the terms.
Level_2_Problem_23.phonetics: /ðɛr simz tu bi ə slaɪt ˌmɪsˌʌndərˈstændɪŋ əˈbaʊt ðə tɜrmz/

Level_2_Leisure_24.text: We went hiking in the mountains last weekend.
Level_2_Leisure_24.phonetics: /wi wɛnt ˈhaɪkɪŋ ɪn ðə ˈmaʊntənz læst ˈwiˌkɛnd/

Level_2_Request_25.text: Would you mind closing the window, please?
Level_2_Request_25.phonetics: /wʊd ju maɪnd ˈkloʊzɪŋ ðə ˈwɪndoʊ pliz/

Level_3_Technology_26.text: Artificial intelligence is rapidly transforming global industry standards.
Level_3_Technology_26.phonetics: /ˌɑrtəˈfɪʃəl ɪnˈtɛlɪdʒəns ɪz ˈræpɪdli trænsˈfɔrmɪŋ ˈgloʊbəl ˈɪndəstri ˈstændərdz/

Level_3_Business_27.text: We need to discuss the quarterly budget and the projected growth rate.
Level_3_Business_27.phonetics: /wi nid tu dɪˈskʌs ðə ˈkwɔrtərli ˈbʌdʒət ænd ðə prəˈdʒɛktɪd groʊθ reɪt/

Level_3_Debate_28.text: I disagree with the premise of your argument on fiscal policy.
Level_3_Debate_28.phonetics: /aɪ ˌdɪsəˈgri wɪð ðə ˈprɛmɪs ʌv jʊər ˈɑrgjumənt ɑn ˈfɪskəl ˈpɑləsi/

Level_3_Education_29.text: Students must submit their final dissertations by the end of the month.
Level_3_Education_29.phonetics: /ˈstudənts mʌst səbˈmɪt ðɛr ˈfaɪnəl ˌdɪsərˈteɪʃənz baɪ ði ɛnd ʌv ðə mʌnθ/

Level_3_Finance_30.text: The volatile market fluctuations affected the portfolio's overall yield.
Level_3_Finance_30.phonetics: /ðə ˈvɑlɪtəl ˈmɑrkɪt ˌflʌktʃuˈeɪʃənz əˈfɛktɪd ðə pɔrtˈfoʊliˌoʊz ˈoʊvərˌɔl jild/

Level_3_Culture_31.text: The Renaissance period significantly influenced modern Western art forms.
Level_3_Culture_31.phonetics: /ðə ˈrɛnəˌsɑns ˈpɪriəd sɪgˈnɪfɪkəntli ˈɪnfluənst ˈmɑdərn ˈwɛstərn ɑrt fɔrmz/

Level_3_Science_32.text: The experimental data corroborated the hypothesis regarding cellular function.
Level_3_Science_32.phonetics: /ði ɪkˌspɛrɪˈmɛntəl ˈdeɪtə kəˈrɑbəˌreɪtɪd ðə haɪˈpɑθəsɪs rɪˈgɑrdɪŋ ˈsɛljələr ˈfʌŋkʃən/

Level_3_Politics_33.text: The bipartisan committee reached a tentative consensus on the infrastructure bill.
Level_3_Politics_33.phonetics: /ðə baɪˈpɑrtəzən kəˈmɪti ritʃt ə ˈtɛntətɪv kənˈsɛnsəs ɑn ði ˈɪnfrəˌstrʌktʃər bɪl/

Level_3_Marketing_34.text: We must optimize our outreach strategy to target the desired demographic.
Level_3_Marketing_34.phonetics: /wi mʌst ˈɑptɪˌmaɪz ˈaʊr ˈaʊtˌritʃ ˈstrætədʒi tu ˈtɑrgɪt ðə dɪˈzaɪərd ˌdɛməˈgræfɪk/

Level_3_Conflict_35.text: There are several logistical challenges that we need to overcome immediately.
Level_3_Conflict_35.phonetics: /ðɛr ɑr ˈsɛvərəl loʊˈdʒɪstɪkəl ˈtʃælɪndʒɪz ðæt wi nid tu ˌoʊvərˈkʌm ɪˈmidiətli/

Level_3_Assessment_36.text: The performance metrics indicate a substantial improvement in efficiency.
Level_3_Assessment_36.phonetics: /ðə pərˈfɔrməns ˈmɛtrɪks ˈɪndəˌkeɪt ə səbˈstænʃəl ɪmˈpruvmənt ɪn ɪˈfɪʃənsi/

Level_3_Historical_37.text: Historians are still debating the precise impact of the industrial revolution.
Level_3_Historical_37.phonetics: /hɪˈstɔriənz ɑr stɪl dɪˈbeɪtɪŋ ðə prɪˈsaɪs ˈɪmpækt ʌv ði ɪnˈdʌstriəl ˌrɛvəˈluʃən/

Level_3_Conclusion_38.text: In conclusion, the gathered evidence overwhelmingly supports the theory.
Level_3_Conclusion_38.phonetics: /ɪn kənˈkluʒən ðə ˈgæðərd ˈɛvədəns ˌoʊvərˈwɛlmɪŋli səˈpɔrts ðə ˈθɪri/

Level_3_Explanation_39.text: This diagram illustrates the complex feedback loop within the ecosystem.
Level_3_Explanation_39.phonetics: /ðɪs ˈdaɪəgræm ˈɪləstreɪts ðə ˈkɑmplɛks ˈfidˌbæk lup wɪðˈɪn ði ˈikoʊˌsɪstəm/

Level_3_Requirement_40.text: Compliance with all regulatory frameworks is absolutely mandatory.
Level_3_Requirement_40.phonetics: /kəmˈplaɪəns wɪð ɔl ˈrɛgjuləˌtɔri ˈfreɪmˌwɜrks ɪz ˈæbsəlutli ˈmændəˌtɔri/

Level_4_Philosophy_41.text: The fundamental dichotomy between nature and nurture is widely debated.
Level_4_Philosophy_41.phonetics: /ðə ˌfʌndəˈmɛntəl daɪˈkɑtəmi bɪˈtwin ˈneɪtʃər ænd ˈnɜːrtʃər ɪz ˈwaɪdli dɪˈbeɪtɪd/

Level_4_Environment_42.text: Mitigating anthropogenic climate change requires global cooperation and immediate action.
Level_4_Environment_42.phonetics: /ˈmɪtɪˌgeɪtɪŋ ˌænθrəpoʊˈdʒɛnɪk ˈklaɪmət tʃeɪndʒ rɪˈkwaɪərz ˈgloʊbəl koʊˌɑpəˈreɪʃən ænd ɪˈmidiət ˈækʃən/

Level_4_Literature_43.text: The author utilizes stream of consciousness to explore the protagonist's inner turmoil.
Level_4_Literature_43.phonetics: /ði ˈɔθər ˈjutɪlaɪzɪz strim ʌv ˈkɑnʃəsnɪs tu ɪkˈsplɔr ðə proʊˈtæɡənɪsts ˈɪnər ˈtɜrmɔɪl/

Level_4_Psychology_44.text: Cognitive dissonance often arises when an individual holds contradictory beliefs simultaneously.
Level_4_Psychology_44.phonetics: /ˈkɑgnətɪv ˈdɪsənəns ˈɔfən əˈraɪzɪz wɛn æn ˌɪndəˈvɪdʒuəl hoʊldz ˌkɑntrəˈdɪktəri bɪˈlifs ˌsaɪməlˈteɪniəsli/

Level_4_Economics_45.text: The government implemented quantitative easing to inject liquidity into the financial system.
Level_4_Economics_45.phonetics: /ðə ˈgʌvərnmənt ˌɪmplɪˈmɛntɪd ˈkwɑntɪˌteɪtɪv ˈizɪŋ tu ɪnˈdʒɛkt lɪˈkwɪdəti ˈɪntu ðə faɪˈnænʃəl ˈsɪstəm/

Level_4_Statistical_46.text: We need to verify the null hypothesis using a rigorous statistical methodology.
Level_4_Statistical_46.phonetics: /wi nid tu ˈvɛrəˌfaɪ ðə nʌl haɪˈpɑθəsɪs ˈjuzɪŋ ə ˈrɪgərəs stəˈtɪstɪkəl ˌmɛθəˈdɑlədʒi/

Level_4_Judicial_48.text: The appeals court upheld the lower court's finding due to insufficient evidence for reversal.
Level_4_Judicial_48.phonetics: /ði əˈpilz kɔrt ʌpˈhɛld ðə ˈloʊər kɔrts ˈfaɪndɪŋ du tu ˌɪnsəˈfɪʃənt ˈɛvədəns fɔr rɪˈvɜrsəl/

Level_4_Theoretical_49.text: The concept posits a paradigm shift in the fundamental understanding of matter and energy.
Level_4_Theoretical_49.phonetics: /ðə ˈkɑnsɛpt ˈpɑzɪts ə ˈpɛrəˌdaɪm ʃɪft ɪn ðə ˌfʌndəˈmɛntəl ˌʌndərˈstændɪŋ ʌv ˈmætər ænd ˈɛnərdʒi/

Level_4_ComplexRequest_50.text: Could you provide a detailed comparative analysis of the two competing architectural proposals?
Level_4_ComplexRequest_50.phonetics: /kʊd ju prəˈvaɪd ə ˈditeɪld kəmˈpɛrətɪv əˈnæləsɪs ʌv ðə tu kəmˈpitɪŋ ˌɑrkɪˈtɛktʃərəl prəˈpoʊzəlz/

Level_5_Physics_51.text: The entanglement of quantum particles demonstrates non-local correlation across vast spatial distances.
Level_5_Physics_51.phonetics: /ði ɪnˈtæŋgəlmənt ʌv ˈkwɑntəm ˈpɑrtɪklz ˈdɛmənˌstreɪts nɑn-ˈloʊkəl ˌkɔrəˈleɪʃən əˈkrɔs væst ˈspeɪʃəl ˈdɪstənsɪz/

Level_5_Legal_52.text: The principle of stare decisis mandates that courts adhere to precedent when adjudicating similar cases.
Level_5_Legal_52.phonetics: /ðə ˈprɪnsəpəl ʌv ˈstɑreɪ dɪˈsaɪsɪs ˈmændeɪts ðæt kɔrts ædˈhɪr tu ˈprɛsɪdənt wɛn əˈdʒuːdɪˌkeɪtɪŋ ˈsɪmələr ˈkeɪsɪz/

Level_5_Biology_53.text: The process of eukaryotic gene expression is regulated by intricate epigenetic mechanisms.
Level_5_Biology_53.phonetics: /ðə ˈproʊsɛs ʌv juˌkæriˈɑtɪk dʒin ɪkˈsprɛʃən ɪz ˈrɛgjuˌleɪtɪd baɪ ˈɪntrɪkət ˌɛpɪdʒɪˈnɛtɪk ˈmɛkəˌnɪzəmz/

Level_5_Philosophy_54.text: Ontological hermeneutics explores the nature of being through the framework of interpretation.
Level_5_Philosophy_54.phonetics: /ˌɑntəˈlɑdʒɪkəl ˌhɜrməˈnutɪks ɪkˈsplɔrz ðə ˈneɪtʃər ʌv ˈbiɪŋ θru ðə ˈfreɪmwɜrk ʌv ˌɪntərprɪˈteɪʃən/

Level_5_Astronomy_55.text: Astrophysicists are seeking observational evidence of primordial gravitational waves and cosmic inflation.
Level_5_Astronomy_55.phonetics: /ˌæstroʊˈfɪzɪsɪsts ɑr ˈsikɪŋ ˌɑbzərˈveɪʃənəl ˈɛvədəns ʌv praɪˈmɔrdiəl ˌgrævɪˈteɪʃənəl weɪvz ænd ˈkɑzmɪk ɪnˈfleɪʃən/

Level_1_Greetings_51.text: 你好，这是一个测试，很高兴认识你。
Level_1_Greetings_51.phonetics: nǐ hǎo, zhè shì yí gè cè shì, hěn gāo xìng rèn shi nǐ.

Level_1_Time_52.phonetics: diàn yǐng shén me shí hou kāi shǐ?

Level_1_Ordering_53.phonetics: wǒ xiǎng diǎn yī bēi shuǐ, xiè xie.

Level_1_DailyLife_54.text: 我每天早上七点起床，先去冲一杯咖啡。
Level_1_DailyLife_54.phonetics: wǒ měi tiān zǎo shang qī diǎn qǐ chuáng, xiān qù chōng yī bēi kā fēi.

Level_1_Weather_55.text: 今天的天气真好，空气非常清新。
Level_1_Weather_55.phonetics: jīn tiān de tiān qì zhēn hǎo, kōng qì fēi cháng qīng xīn.

Level_1_Shopping_56.phonetics: qǐng wèn zhè ge duō shǎo qián?

Level_1_Location_57.phonetics: xǐ shǒu jiān zài nǎ lǐ?

Level_1_Food_58.phonetics: wǒ bú tài néng chī là.

Level_1_Check_59.phonetics: hǎo de, wǒ zhī dào le.

Level_2_Travel_61.text: 机场离这里大约三十分钟，坐地铁更方便。
Level_2_Travel_61.phonetics: jī chǎng lí zhè lǐ dà yuē sān shí fēn zhōng, zuò dì tiě gèng fāng biàn.

Level_2_Directions_62.text: 您能告诉我最近的地铁站在哪里吗？
Level_2_Directions_62.phonetics: nín néng gào sù wǒ zuì jìn de dì tiě zhàn zài nǎ lǐ ma?

Level_2_Shopping_63.text: 请问这件外套有其他颜色或尺码吗？
Level_2_Shopping_63.phonetics: qǐng wèn zhè jiàn wài tào yǒu qí tā yán sè huò chǐ mǎ ma?

Level_2_Medical_64.text: 我感觉喉咙很痛，还有点发烧。
Level_2_Medical_64.phonetics: wǒ gǎn jué hóu lóng hěn tòng, hái yǒu diǎn fā shāo.

Level_2_Internet_65.text: 请把这个链接发到群里，让大家点赞。
Level_2_Internet_65.phonetics: qǐng bǎ zhè gè liàn jiē fā dào qún lǐ, ràng dà jiā diǎn zàn.

Level_2_Job_66.text: 我下周会提交这份详细的工作报告。
Level_2_Job_66.phonetics: wǒ xià zhōu huì tí jiāo zhè fèn xiáng xì de gōng zuò bào gào.

Level_2_FuturePlan_67.text: 我计划明年去欧洲旅行一个月。
Level_2_FuturePlan_67.phonetics: wǒ jì huà míng nián qù ōu zhōu lǚ xíng yī gè yuè.

Level_2_WeatherDes_68.text: 今天温度骤降，请注意保暖。
Level_2_WeatherDes_68.phonetics: jīn tiān wēn dù zhòu jiàng, qǐng zhù yì bǎo nuǎn.

Level_2_PoliteRequest_69.text: 麻烦您稍微等我一下，我马上回来。
Level_2_PoliteRequest_69.phonetics: má fán nín shāo wēi děng wǒ yī xià, wǒ mǎ shàng huí lai.

Level_2_Opinion_70.text: 我认为这个方案可行性很高。
Level_2_Opinion_70.phonetics: wǒ rèn wéi zhè ge fāng àn kě xíng xìng hěn gāo.

Level_2_Hobby_71.text: 我平时喜欢在周末去公园跑步。
Level_2_Hobby_71.phonetics: wǒ píng shí xǐ huan zài zhōu mò qù gōng yuán pǎo bù.

Level_2_Transportation_72.text: 从这里到火车站需要换乘一次。
Level_2_Transportation_72.phonetics: cóng zhè lǐ dào huǒ chē zhàn xū yào huàn chéng yī cì.

Level_2_Error_73.text: 不好意思，我刚才说错了。
Level_2_Error_73.phonetics: bù hǎo yì si, wǒ gāng cái shuō cuò le.

Level_2_Invitation_74.phonetics: nín yǒu kòng yī qǐ chī wǎn fàn ma?

Level_2_Advice_75.text: 我觉得你应该先休息一下。
Level_2_Advice_75.phonetics: wǒ jué de nǐ yīng gāi xiān xiū xi yī xià.

Level_3_Business_76.text: 我们需要在散会之前，把季度预算和预估增长率讨论清楚。
Level_3_Business_76.phonetics: wǒ men xū yào zài sàn huì zhī qián, bǎ jì dù yù suàn hé yù gū zēng zhǎng lǜ tǎo lùn qīng chǔ.

Level_3_Technology_77.text: 人工智能正在快速地改变全球的行业标准。
Level_3_Technology_77.phonetics: rén gōng zhì néng zhèng zài kuài sù de gǎi biàn quán qiú de háng yè biāo zhǔn.

Level_3_FoodCulture_78.text: 四川火锅以其麻辣鲜香的味道闻名于世。
Level_3_FoodCulture_78.phonetics: sì chuān huǒ guō yǐ qí má là xiān xiāng de wèi dào wén míng yú shì.

Level_3_History_79.text: 秦始皇统一六国，建立了中国历史上第一个大一统王朝。
Level_3_History_79.phonetics: qín shǐ huáng tǒng yī liù guó, jiàn lì le zhōng guó lì shǐ shang dì yī gè dà yī tǒng wáng cháo.

Level_3_Finance_80.text: 宏观经济的波动对中小企业的生存产生了巨大影响。
Level_3_Finance_80.phonetics: hóng guān jīng jì de bō dòng duì zhōng xiǎo qǐ yè de shēng cún chǎn shēng le jù dà yǐng xiǎng.

Level_3_Academic_81.text: 这篇论文的论证逻辑严密，引用资料准确。
Level_3_Academic_81.phonetics: zhè piān lùn zhèng de lùn zhèng luó jí yán mì, yǐn yòng zī liào zhǔn què.

Level_3_Social_82.text: 社会保障体系的完善是保障公民基本权益的关键。
Level_3_Social_82.phonetics: shè huì bǎo zhàng tǐ xì de wán shàn shì bǎo zhàng gōng mín jī běn quán yì de guān jiàn.

Level_3_Environment_83.text: 保护生物多样性是当前人类面临的重大挑战之一。
Level_3_Environment_83.phonetics: bǎo hù shēng wù duō yàng xìng shì dāng qián rén lèi miàn lín de zhòng dà tiǎo zhàn zhī yī.

Level_3_Negotiation_84.text: 关于付款方式和交付日期，我们是否可以进一步协商？
Level_3_Negotiation_84.phonetics: guān yú fù kuǎn fāng shì hé jiāo fù rì qī, wǒ men shì fǒu kě yǐ jìn yī bù xié shāng?

Level_3_Media_85.text: 这个新闻报道存在片面性，我们应该多方核实。
Level_3_Media_85.phonetics: zhè ge xīn wén bào dào cún zài piàn miàn xìng, wǒ men yīng gāi duō fāng hé shí.

Level_3_Idiom_86.text: 他的成功并非一蹴而就，而是日积月累的结果。
Level_3_Idiom_86.phonetics: tā de chéng gōng bìng fēi yī cù ér jiù, ér shì rì jī yuè lěi de jié guǒ.

Level_3_Formal_87.text: 感谢您的莅临指导，为我们提供了宝贵意见。
Level_3_Formal_87.phonetics: gǎn xiè nín de lì lín zhǐ dǎo, wèi wǒ men tí gōng le bǎo guì yì jiàn.

Level_3_Description_88.text: 这座建筑融合了传统与现代的设计理念。
Level_3_Description_88.phonetics: zhè zuò jiàn zhù róng hé le chuán tǒng yǔ xiàn dài de shè jì lǐ niàn.

Level_3_Argument_89.text: 我们必须对潜在的风险保持警惕，并制定应急预案。
Level_3_Argument_89.phonetics: wǒ men bì xū duì qián zài de fēng xiǎn bǎo chí jǐng tì, bìng zhì dìng yìng jí yù àn.

Level_3_Culture_90.text: 春节是中国最重要的传统节日，家家户户都要团聚。
Level_3_Culture_90.phonetics: chūn jié shì zhōng guó zuì zhòng yào de chuán tǒng jié rì, jiā jiā hù hù dōu yào tuán jù.

Level_4_Poem_91.text: 欲穷千里目，更上一层楼。
Level_4_Poem_91.phonetics: yù qióng qiān lǐ mù, gèng shàng yī céng lóu.

Level_4_Classical_92.text: 道可道，非常道；名可名，非常名。
Level_4_Classical_92.phonetics: dào kě dào, fēi cháng dào; míng kě míng, fēi cháng míng.

Level_4_Literature_93.text: 红楼梦是中国古典小说的巅峰之作，具有极高的艺术价值。
Level_4_Literature_93.phonetics: hóng lóu mèng shì zhōng guó gǔ diǎn xiǎo shuō de diān fēng zhī zuò, jù yǒu jí gāo de yì shù jià zhí.

Level_4_Philosophy_94.text: 事物的本质在于其矛盾性，矛盾是事物发展的根本动力。
Level_4_Philosophy_94.phonetics: shì wù de běn zhì zài yú qí máo dùn xìng, máo dùn shì shì wù fā zhǎn de gēn běn dòng lì.

Level_4_Scientific_95.text: 量子力学的非定域性揭示了宏观世界难以理解的现象。
Level_4_Scientific_95.phonetics: liàng zǐ lì xué de fēi dìng yù xìng jiē shì le hóng guān shì jiè nán yǐ lǐ jiě de xiàn xiàng.

Level_5_TongueTwister_96.text: 八百标兵奔北坡，炮兵并排北边跑，炮兵怕把标兵碰，标兵怕碰炮兵炮。
Level_5_TongueTwister_96.phonetics: bā bǎi biāo bīng bēn běi pō, pào bīng bìng pái běi biān pǎo, pào bīng pà bǎ biāo bīng pèng, biāo bīng pà pèng pào bīng pào.

Level_5_AbstractTheory_97.text: 意识形态的异化与再生产，构成了后现代社会权力运作的核心矛盾。
Level_5_AbstractTheory_97.phonetics: yì shi xíng tài de yì huà yǔ zài shēng chǎn, gòu chéng le hòu xiàn dài shè huì quán lì yùn zuò de hé xīn máo dùn.

Level_5_TongueTwister_98.text: 黑化肥发灰，灰化肥发黑。
Level_5_TongueTwister_98.phonetics: hēi huà féi fā huī, huī huà féi fā hēi.

Level_5_TongueTwister_99.text: 石狮寺有四十四只石狮子，不知是四十四只石狮子，还是四十死石狮子。
Level_5_TongueTwister_99.phonetics: shí shī sì yǒu sì shí sì zhī shí shī zi, bù zhī shì sì shí sì zhī shí shī zi, hái shì sì shí sǐ shí shī zi.

Level_5_ClassicalQuote_100.text: 知之为知之，不知为不知，是知也。
Level_5_ClassicalQuote_100.phonetics: zhī zhī wèi zhī zhī, bù zhī wèi bù zhī, shì zhī yě.
